title: Mountain family in Europe
brief_description: Passing through a mountain valley to a small village, the camera follows a tractor up the hillsides to the summer grazing area. Here the summer activities are seen: the milking of cows by hand, the making of cheese and the cutting, drying and collection of hay. No commentary. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
